code: import{useState}from'react';import User from'./User';import classes from'./Users.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DUMMY_USERS=[{id:'u1',name:'Max'},{id:'u2',name:'Manuel'},{id:'u3',name:'Julie'}];const Users=()=>{const[showUsers,setShowUsers]=useState(true);const toggleUsersHandler=()=>{setShowUsers(curState=>!curState);};const usersList=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:DUMMY_USERS.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{name:user.name},user.id))});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.users,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:toggleUsersHandler,children:[showUsers?'Hide':'Show'," Users"]}),showUsers&&usersList]});};export default Users;
